products.name: Ukelele
products.description: The ukulele, is a versatile instrument, and it is often used and heard in a broad range of musical genres, including jazz, country music, pop, world music, and rock.

products.name: Acoustic Guitar
products.description: The Acoustic Guitar is best known for it's natrual ability to amplify the sound waves produced from the guitar. From struming chords to plucking strings the sounds stand above like none else.

products.name: Acoustic Bass
products.description: Acoustic basses are very popular with many players who use them for practice, acoustic jamming and even some performance scenarios.

products.name: Banjo
products.description: Often associated with American old-time music, traditional jazz, and country or folk music such as Bluegrass.

products.name: Viola
products.description: A stringed musical instrument, the tenor of the violin family. It is built in proportions similar to those of the violin but has a body length of 37 to 43 cm (14.5 to 17 inches), about 5 cm (2 inches) longer than a violin.

products.name: Violin
products.description: The violin is a string instrument which has four strings and is played with a bow. The violin is the smallest and highest pitched string instrument typically used in western music.

products.name: Cello
products.description: The cello is a stringed instrument between the viola and bass in pitch, and is also used as a solo instrument, ensemble member, and part of the strings section of an orchestra

products.name: Double Bass
products.description: The lowest-pitched member of the violin family, sounding an octave lower than the cello. It varies considerably in size, the largest normally being under 6 feet (1.8 metres) in total length.

products.name: Harp
products.description: Although not often common of being a popular instrument. The harp is best known for the harmonic and almost angelic sounds it produces.

products.name: Biwa
products.description: The Biwa is the chosen instrument of Benten, goddess of music, eloquence, poetry, and often used in narrative storytelling. Very popular after its appearance in the popular anime Demon Slayer.

products.name: Lute
products.description: The lute was the instrument of kings and queens, playing the sublime music of great composers. The lute was heard in the theatre in the incidental music of Shakespeare's plays.

products.name: Sanshin
products.description: The Sanshin is considered the soul of Okinawan folk music. It is the center of small informal family gatherings, weddings, birthdays, other celebrations, community parties, festivals.
